thing-type.label: Telegram Bot
thing-type.description: Thing to receive the latest message send to a Telegram Bot.

parameter.name: botToken
parameter.label: Bot Token
parameter.description: Enter the bot token you received from the "BotFather".

parameter.name: chatIds
parameter.label: Chat Id(s)
parameter.description: Enter your chat id(s). Only messages from this id(s) will be send to openHAB.

parameter.name: parseMode
parameter.label: Parse Mode
parameter.description: Support for formatted messages, values: Markdown or HTML. Default: no formatting is used.

parameter.name: proxyHost
parameter.label: Proxy Host
parameter.description: Enter your proxy host. It will be used for telegram binding only and doesn't affect entire system.

parameter.name: proxyType
parameter.label: Proxy Type
parameter.description: Enter your proxy type. Default: SOCKS5

channel-type.label: Last Message Text
channel-type.description: Contains the latest message text as a string

channel-type.label: Last Message Date
channel-type.description: Contains the latest message date as a DateTime

channel-type.label: Last Message Name
channel-type.description: Contains the latest message senders name as a string

channel-type.label: Last Message Username
channel-type.description: Contains the latest message senders username as a string

channel-type.label: Chat Id
channel-type.description: Contains the id of chat from where the message was received.

channel-type.label: Reply Id
channel-type.description: Contains the id of the reply which was passed to sendTelegram() as replyId. This id can be used to have an unambiguous assignment of the user reply to the message which was sent by the bot.
